description:
Second-year high school student http://anidb.net/ch124896 [Hizutome Rakurou] is interested in one thing only: finding "shitty games" and beating the crap out of them. His gaming skills are second to none, and no game is too bad for him to enjoy. So when he`s introduced to the new VR game Shangri-La Frontier, he does what he does best—min-maxes and skips the prologue to jump straight into the action. But can even an expert gamer like Rakurou discover all the secrets that Shangri-La Frontier hides...?
Source: Kodansha
Note: The first two episodes received an early screening at a special event on September 17, 2023 at KYOMAF in Kyoto. Additionally, the first three episodes received an early screening at a special event on September 30, 2023 at United Cinemas Aqua City Odaiba in Tokyo. The regular TV broadcast started on October 1, 2023.

REGULAR.description:
A "Trash-Game Hunter" whose hobby is beating the world`s worst video games logs in to the world`s most popular online RPG.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anata wa Nan no Tame ni Game o Shimasuka?
Pourquoi joues-tu aux jeux vidéo ?
What Do You Play Games For?
貴方はなんのためにゲームをしますか?

REGULAR.description:
Rakuro fights the Ravenous Python, arrives in the game`s second town, and explores its weapons crafting system before venturing out at night.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Peculiar One
Le seul et l`unique
Tokui Naru Mono
特異なる者

REGULAR.description:
The battle with Lycagon the Nightslayer leaves Sunraku in an unexpected situation. Soon after, he`s barreling down the rabbit hole to a new adventure!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Black Wolf Nightslayer
Kuro Ookami Yashuu
Lycaon, les Dents de la Nuit
黒狼夜襲

REGULAR.description:
Sunraku agrees to train under Vysache and he`s saddled with the Vorpal Soul Collar which decreases his EXP gain but increases stat point rewards upon leveling up. Afterward Emul offers to join Sunraku`s party and they set off for Thirdrema.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Trash Game Realignment of Elevated Tastes
Koeta Kachikan o Kusogee de Susugu
Une bouse pour se remettre les idées en place
肥えた価値観をクソゲーで濯ぐ

REGULAR.description:
On their way to Thirdrema, Sunraku an Emul encounter the area boss Mud Digger in the middle of a swamp which greatly reduces their movement. Being at a disadvantage Sunraku needs figure out how his newly evolved skills work so he can take Mud Digger down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Encerclé par les lances du scandale
Kakute Nanji, Soudou no Yaribusuma ni Kakomaren
Lo, Thou Art Assailed on All Sides
かくて汝, 騒動の槍衾に囲まれん

REGULAR.description:
Sunraku encounters Arthur Pencilgon, whom he knows as Pencil Knight from another game called "Unite Rounds". She brings with her a message that he either publish what he knows about the unique scenario or wear a target on his back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikki Yougu no Kishi Ou
La chevaleresse de la papeterie
The Writing Tool Knight-Queen
筆記用具の騎士王

REGULAR.description:
Sunraku manages to stave off his attackers and reach Thirdrema, where he and Emul then travel back to Rabituza. Emul then takes Sunraku to the Vorpal Colosseum where he`s pitted against 10 opponents to further his training.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Remnant of the Divinity: The Aberrant Loser
Shindai no Zanshi, Moushuu no Haisha
Vestige antique, désillusion du perdant
神代の残滓, 妄執の敗者

REGULAR.description:
The 10th opponent in the Rabituza arena is the Aberrant Woodmage, a powerful foe combining fast attacks with magic. Underleveled and understatted, Sunraku only needs to survive five minutes to win... but can he make it happen?!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: 300 Limit Kyousou Kyoku
300 secondes de capriccio
300リミット狂騒曲
The 300-Limit Pandemonium

REGULAR.description:
Sunraku has to make it out of town so he can move on to the Prismatic Forest Grotto, but Ashura Kai and Psyger-0 stand in his way. Once he reaches the grotto itself, a dazzling array of sights await him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Dazzling Sea of Trees
Hanayaka naru Ki no Umi
Une forêt aux mille couleurs
華やかなる樹の海

REGULAR.description:
Sunraku continues his way through the Prismatic Forest Grotto where he encounters the area boss Clown Spider. He tells Emul to stay back as he wants to solo it first try with a no-hit run.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Go Tomb Raiding!!
Un pillage de tombeau pour se motiver !
Yarouze, Haka Arashi!!
やろうぜ, 墓荒らし!!

REGULAR.description:
Sunraku speaks with Vysache about their plans to defeat Wethermon the Tombguard. After their discussion Vysache decides to help Sunraku in his endeavor by ascending his weapons.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’éclat véritable
Makoto no Kagayaki
The Glimmer of Truth
まことのかがやき

REGULAR.description:
Pencilgon sends Sunraku and Oikatzo to the Iron Ruins of the Divinity to grind their levels to at least level 50. While there they encounter the Lifestide Lake Serpent monster.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koukai wa Itsumo Kako ni Iru
Laisser les regrets au passé
Regrets Always Lie in the Past
後悔はいつも過去にいる

REGULAR.description:
Pencilgon, Sunraku, and Oikatzo make their way to find the NPC Setsuna of Bygone Days, Wethermon`s former lover. She presents to them the Unique Scenario "From the Living World, With Love" which they accept.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ici ne restent que les regrets
Miren dake ga Soko ni Iru
Only Resentments About the End of Life Remain
未練だけがそこにいる

REGULAR.description:
Sunraku has encountered a new player named Dragonfly in "BERP". The two engage in a series of matches with bug exploits allowed. Afterwards Sunrakru heads to Rabituza to link his skills at the Skill Garden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Et clic
Puchitto
Squish
ぷちっと

REGULAR.description:
On the night of the new moon, the members of Ashura Kai are ambushed by a group of allied clans including Psyger-0. Meanwhile, Sunraku, Oikatzo, and Pencilgon confront Wethermon the Tombguard at the Hidden Garden.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Putting Feelings Into a Moment, Part 1
Setsuna ni Omoi o Komete: Sono Ichi
Émotions pour un bref instant (partie 1)
刹那に想いを込めて 其の一

REGULAR.description:
Sunraku and the others are engaged in a battle against Wethermon the Tombguard, and making full use of resurrection items. Ten minutes have passed since the battle began and Wethermon summons his tactical mount "Kirin".
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Putting Feelings Into a Moment, Part 2
Setsuna ni Omoi o Komete: Sono Ni
Émotions pour un bref instant (partie 2)
刹那に想いを込めて 其の二

REGULAR.description:
The battle with Wethermon the Tombguard moves to its next phase. Pencilgon and Oikatzo, exploiting rare items, focus on Kirin who has transformed into a suit of armor. Meanwhile Sunraku goes on the offensive to defeat Wethermon before he crumbles away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Putting Feelings Into a Moment, Part 3
Setsuna ni Omoi o Komete: Sono San
Émotions pour un bref instant (partie 3)
刹那に想いを込めて 其の三

REGULAR.description:
Items are depleted, weapons and gear are on the verge of breaking, and Wethermon continues his Clear Sky Conquest barrage on Sunraku while Pencilgon and Oikatzo continue their efforts to dismantle Kirin Armor. Sunraku goes all-in to finish the fight.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Putting Feelings Into a Moment, Part 4
Setsuna ni Omoi o Komete: Sono Yon
Émotions pour un bref instant (partie 4)
刹那に想いを込めて 其の四

REGULAR.description:
Wethermon falls into a slumber and Setsuna of Bygone Days leaves behind a hint that will lead to the truth about SLF. Wethermon`s subjugation is reported to all players in game. Now, standing before the battle-weary trio are angry members of Ashura Kai...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Monde en marche, héros révélés
Susumu Sekai, Akasareru Eiyuu
The World Progresses, the Heroes Are Revealed
進む世界, 明かされる英雄

REGULAR.description:
Utopia, SLF`s development company, is in a tizzy over the defeat of Wethermon the Tombguard. Sunraku is excited to kick off his bonus unique scenario Vorpal Epic. He then decides to check out the loot he received from defeating Wethermon.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Current Situations and Next Steps
Le présent et le futur
Sorezore no Ima to Tsugi
それぞれの今と次

REGULAR.description:
"Unique monsters make money" Pencilgon suggests forming a clan with Sunraku and Oikatzo. After temporarily splitting, Sunraku returns to the Palace of Rabituza with the Non-Standard Ether Reactor he received from Oikatzo and comes up with a great idea."
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Emplettes, développement et progression
Errands, Cultivation, and Game Progress
Otsukai to Ikusei to Kouryaku to
お使いと育成と攻略と

REGULAR.description:
Bilac accepts Sanraku`s proposal and they head to the Canyon of Ancient Souls to obtain the magic operations unit necessary for becoming an Ancient Craftsman. Lycagon`s Mark causes weak monsters to flee, then they encounter the rare Dullahan General.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Purificateur d’air ambulant
The Walking Air Purifier
Walking of the Air Cleaner
ウォーキング・オブ・ザ・エアクリーナー

REGULAR.description:
Sunraku, Emul, and Bilac face off against the area boss the Humming Lich in the Canyon of Ancient Souls. Struggling to inflict damage, Bilac rushes to rework the Dullahan General`s Decapitator into a holy-attribute weapon.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Bird with Rabbits vs. Skeletal Choir
Oiseau et lapins VS chœur de squelettes
Tori with Usagi vs. Gasshou Dokuro
鳥with兎 vs. 合唱髑髏

REGULAR.description:
Sunraku returns to the Canyon Ancient Souls, where he encounters a swarm of Crystal Scorpions that are over level 100. Struggling to acquire the rare materials he seeks, Sunraku watches the scorpions` movements and comes up with a secret plan...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Rare Item wa Inochi yori mo Omoi
Rare Items, Worth More Than Life Itself
Un objet rare vaut plus qu’une vie
レアアイテムは命よりも重い

REGULAR.description:
Bilac finds jewelry among Sunraku`s loot. In order to show them to a jeweler, she introduces Sunraku to Aramiys, the swordsman of Cazzeria, and vice captain of the Musketeers in Boots. Later they head to Eighthold where they encounter the Professor.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ceux qui chassaient l’obscurité
Sekai no Kurayami o Hiraku Mono
Those Who Illuminate the World`s Darkness
世界の暗闇を拓く者

SPECIAL.description:
Sunraku and the others gather to take a look back at past events to get viewers refreshed and up to date before their battle with Wethermon the Tombguard.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Special Bonus Episode: Get Yourselves Caught Up with This Light-Speed Recap!
Special Tokuban: Saishin Wa made Maruwakari! Chousoku Digest
スペシャル特番 最新話まで丸わかり! 超速ダイジェスト

Shangri-La Frontier
Shangri-La Frontier
